features: 【Great Value】 Pragmatic household tools, You could wipe off dripping sauces, burnt food, greasy oils easily with our gas range protectors, keep your stove and kitchen clean and neat. you will love your kitchen again with no mess. And make your stovetop fresh like a new one.

【Safe and Environmental】: Most Certified BPA & PFOA Free. This gas range protectors could let the harmful chemicals keep away from your family and could resist up to 500 degrees Fahrenheit. Pay attention to： this stove liner are not completely fireproof，so you shouldn't let it direct contact with flames.

【Easy to clean & Cut】 This reusable stove top covers for gas burners is safe and very easy to clean. You can easily wipe the dust and oil on the gas range protectors in hot soapy water. Dimension of our burner liner cover is 10.6 x 10.6 inch(W*L), thickness 0.3mm. Pre-cut design at the center allows you to adjust the inner radius to fit your burners easily.
【Eco-Friendly & Reuse】 The stove liners are 100% Most Certified BPA & PFOA Free, you can wash them in hot soapy water or in the dishwasher multiple times, they are durable and reusable.

【What A Great Gift】 Roasting gifts for men,women,family, colleagues, parents,mother's day,father's day,thanksgiving day, Christmas, valentine day,house warming gifts for new homeowners , wedding gifts for newlyweds, hostess gifts for housewives.Those who receive it will absolutely love it. And we provide superb customer service, your satisfaction is guaranteed. If you are not satisfied with the stove burner covers you received, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: NUOKBONY STOVE BURNER COVERS Keep your kitchen stove area clean and tidy

STOVE BUNNER COVERS High-Temperature Resistance Each burner cover gas has been proven to be highly flexible and heat resistant to withstand temperatures up to 260°C (500°F) Non-Stick The Stove Burner Covers Are Non-Stick to Keep Your Stove Clean at Any Time Good Materials Not release an unpleasant smell when used Notice 1.Remove protector before cleaning the stove 2.Don’t put the gas stove protector directly on the flame 3.Keep it at least 0.5 inches from the flame. 4.Don’t use it on oven rack and electric furnaces 5.Don’t use it when the temperatures OVER 500 °F

Easy Clean & Dishwasher safe 1.The Stove Gap Covers can be cleaned with a damp cloth or hand-washed in the sink 2.Premium quality heat resistant silicone withstands heat dry cycles in the dishwasher without any degradation

MARK Measuring the size precisely and mark by a pen CUT Cutting to a suitable size according to the mark REMOVE GRATE Taking off the stove accessories and laying the cover FINISH Reassembling accessories and finish

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cute these to fit my stove top! But they works great and easy to wash

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does the Job
reviews.reviewText: I have an older gas stove that is just a bear to keep clean. I scrubbed and scrubbed on it but just could never get and keep all the grease stains off the stove top. I saw these and decided to try them and I think I'll recommend them although I may experiment with some other products later. The good, the cover the area well, they take the heat with no problem and they've been easy to clean so far. The not so good, they are a bit of a pain to fit to your burners and get to stay in place while you put grates back in place. You have to cut them to size which is a bit of a challenge around the round burner and then once you do cut them (you have to cut inside circle to fit and the outside edges as well) they want to slide all over the place while you are reinserting the grates. I will say that once you have it reassembled there's no problem with them moving. While I hope to find a better product I will say that this product does work and is worlds better than having nothing covering your stove top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ya no limpio mucho solo quito el cover y fácil el aceite se quita muy rápido me encanta para mi estufa muy útil 👍🏼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It actually caught fire while I was cooking over a medium flame. You get what you pay for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hard to cut them identical
reviews.reviewText: I struggled cutting them nicely to fit my stove but overall it does the job so I’d have to say 3

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: Got these to protect a new gas range. They're adequate for the purpose, easy to cut to the shape needed. What they won't do, is to keep a larger spill from leaking under the covers, but I didn't expect them to. They'll help keep most splatters off the range and if we have people over, we'll just remove them. I'm happy with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stove burner covers
reviews.reviewText: The quality and performance so far has been good. Also, the value for the money is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You Sitll Have to Clean Them But--
reviews.reviewText: --you are not scrubbing your stove top! I bought these for my gas range. I trimmed them to fit as per the instructions. Anything spilled on them and seemingly baked onto them comes off easily! It's amazing hwo easy they are to clean. You can also run them through the dishwasher. They are made of fiberglass so they withstand any punishment, I highly recommend!
